WITH RankedPosts AS (SELECT USER_ID, MAX(POSTING_TIME) AS LatestPost FROM POST GROUP BY USER_ID), NumberedPosts AS (SELECT R.USER_ID, R.LatestPost, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY R.LatestPost DESC) AS rn FROM RankedPosts R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_ID = M.USER_ID WHERE M.STATUS IN ('Y', 'A') ) SELECT M.* FROM NumberedPosts NP JOIN MEMBER M ON NP.USER_ID = M.USER_ID WHERE NP.rn BETWEEN 1 AND 7 ORDER BY NP.LatestPost DESC
